He shows emotional stability, adapting easily to various social settings, which contributes to his adaptable and enjoyable routine. As he continues to explore the city, he is likely to return to familiar places like the Brewery and Asian eateries, while also seeking new experiences in vibrant nightlife spots and cultural events.
